employees.description: My career profile reveals my ability to successfully fulfill the roles of web application engineer, project manager, process improvement expert and client satisfaction specialist. employees.description: Full stack data scientist, from problem definition to deployment. Interested in applying my innate curiosity to data of all sorts. I will increase KPI of your company through detailed product and user analysis.

employees.description: I know how to create applications using Ruby and Python. I'm skilful at and also enthusiastic about backend, analytics, new product development, A/B hypothesis testing. I prefer pure Ruby/Python so as not to hide realisation behind abstractions. Front-end is also one of my skills.

employees.name: Andrei Ezhov
employees.description: I'm interested in eCommerce projects, love to improve conversion rates of forms and landing pages. Make hypophyses basing on data and run A/B tests – this is what I'm great at. Also I'm ready to build content strategy which can actually drive sales

employees.name: Dzmitry Kachanau
employees.description: I focus on marketing campaigns which are covering both acquisition and retention. I’m happy as well to help improve your product, as it’s my strong belief, that without progress on conversion & optimization within the product, there wouldn’t be a great progress on marketing.

employees.name: Marina Belkova
employees.description: A successful and result-oriented Sales and Marketing Manager with years of experience in digital marketing. employees.name: Natalia Novikova
employees.description: Technical support for advertising. DoubleClick for Publisher is my bible. Running traffic ads across a variety of third parties. Troubleshooting ad network integrations, finding and solving issues. Good experience with Mobile Ads.

employees.description: I was working closely with the sales and marketing departments to reach the highest advertising revenue goals in company’s history. Experience of working with agencies, companies and key partners are also included. Due to relocation, at the moment I am looking for a challenging position in the field of sales and business development in Moscow.
